column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:–------ Cambodian Ministry of Health has confirmed two new cases of Covid-19 on Saturday
column5: according to a press release at 9 pm.------Initial reports say the cases are of French nationals aged 67 and 80
column6: and are now in hospital in Sihanoukville. They arrived in SHK on March 18.------The ministry also informed that one of the three British nationals earlier tested positive of Covid-19 from Viking Cruises has fully recovered.------The recovered 65-year-old British will be discharged from hospital tomorrow.------ ------Map of the outbreak------*Verified reports from Chines government health authorities also say hat people entering China from Cambodia have tested positive on arrival. One confirmed case reported------ HERE
